title: EC directs finalisation of polling centres for Feb 12 election
body: The Election Commission (EC) has instructed election officials of all districts to finalise polling stations for the 13th National Parliamentary Election and referendum slated for February 12 next year and asked for the final list of polling centres within five working days. The directive was issued through an office order signed by EC Secretariat Deputy Secretary Md Humayun Kabir today. According to the order, the commission published a draft list of polling centres on September 10 in line with the Polling Centre Establishment and Management Policy, 2025. After resolving claims and objections, a final list was prepared on October 20. If any change, replacement or amendment is required to the list in accordance with the policy mentioned, the EC has sent instructions to all senior district election officers or district election officers across the country to complete the process within the next five working days. According to the EC's published list, a total of 42,761 polling centres have been designated for the national election and the referendum across 300 parliamentary constituencies.
